sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { assets } from '../../assets/assets' import { StoreContext } from '../../context/StoreContext' import './FoodItem.css' const FoodItem = ({id, name, price, description, image}) => { const[itemCount, setItemcount] = useState(0) const[cardItems, addToCart, removeFromCart] = useContext(StoreContext) return (
{!cardItems[id] ?addToCart(id)} src={assets.add_icon_white} /> :
removeFromCart(id)} src={assets.remove_icon_red}/>

{itemCount}

addToCart(id)} src={assets.add_icon_green}/>
}

{name}

{description}

${price}

) } export default FoodItem
